Detailed Description

The class provides the information for the current wifi connection.

It provides the detailed states, speed, and IP address.

 //assume we have a pointer "currentWifiInfo" of WifiInfo instance

 //get the transfer speed(Mbps)
 int32_t speed = currentWifiInfo->getLinkSpeed();

 //get the IP address
 int32_t ip = currentWifiInfo->getIpAddress();
 gaia::base::String ipStr = String::format("%d:%d:%d:%d", ip&0xff, (ip>>8)&0xff, 
                                                (ip>>16)&0xff, (ip>>24)&0xff);
 
 //get current Wi-Fi status 
 int32_t status = currentWifiInfo->getStatus();
See also:
WifiManager::getCurrentStatus()

Definition at line 47 of file WifiInfo.h.
